sentences.en: But legal experts are not sure if such a charge can stick.
sentences.cn: 但法律专家们不能肯定这一指控是否成立。

sentences.en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
sentences.cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

sentences.en: He'd phoned Laura to see if she was better.
sentences.cn: 他打电话给劳拉看她是不是好些了。

sentences.en: hundreds if not thousands of germs.
sentences.cn: 数以百计甚至可能数以千计的细菌。

sentences.en: I haven't made much of this—if anything, I've played it down.
sentences.cn: 对此我并没有加以重视——如果是这样的话，那我是看低它了。

sentences.en: I think I can fix it tomorrow. If not, you’ll have to wait till Friday.
sentences.cn: 我想明天我能修好它，如果不行，你只好等到周五了。

sentences.en: I want to get back by five o’clock if possible.
sentences.cn: 如果可能的话，我想5点之前回来。

sentences.en: I would go to see him if I were you.
sentences.cn: 换作是我，我会去见他。

sentences.en: if and when the film gets the green light, be sure you've read the book first.
sentences.cn: 万一电影得到许可，千万保证你已经读过那本书了。

sentences.en: If by any chance you can’t manage dinner tonight, perhaps we can at least have a drink together.
sentences.cn: 万一你今晚不能来吃饭，或许我们至少可以一起喝一杯。

sentences.en: If Dad were here, he would know what to do.
sentences.cn: 如果爸爸在这儿，他会知道怎么做的。

sentences.en: If I didn’t apologize, I’d feel guilty.
sentences.cn: 如果我不道歉，我会感到内疚。

sentences.en: if only I had listened to you.
sentences.cn: 如果我听你的话就好了。

sentences.en: If they value these data, let them pay for them.
sentences.cn: 他们要是看重这些数据，就让他们出钱买。

sentences.en: If you build more plastics into cars, the car lasts longer.
sentences.cn: 如果汽车采用更多塑料元件，寿命会更长一些。

sentences.en: If you had worked harder, you would have passed your exams.
sentences.cn: 要是你再努力一点，就通过考试了。

sentences.en: If you love life, life will love you back.
sentences.cn: 热爱生活，生活也会厚爱你。

sentences.en: If you need money, I can lend you some.
sentences.cn: 如果你需要钱，我能借给你一些。

sentences.en: If you wait, all that happens is that you get older.
sentences.cn: 如果你等待，发生的只有变老。

sentences.en: If you're not satisfied with the life you're living, don't just complain. Do something about it.
sentences.cn: 对于现况的不满，不能只是抱怨，要有勇气作出改变。

sentences.en: If your skin becomes red, sore or very scaly, consult your doctor.
sentences.cn: 如果皮肤发红、瘙痒或脱皮，要向医生咨询。

sentences.en: Is the book available, and if so, where?
sentences.cn: 有没有这本书？ 如果有的话，在哪儿？

sentences.en: More people would be attracted to cycling if conditions were right.
sentences.cn: 如果天气适宜，会有更多的人被吸引到骑自行车的行列中来。

sentences.en: So, if we could just move onto something else?
sentences.cn: 那么我们可不可以干脆谈点别的？

sentences.en: Taste the soup and add salt and pepper if necessary.
sentences.cn: 尝一下汤，需要的话加一点盐和胡椒粉。

sentences.en: The house seemed muted, hushed as if it had been deserted.
sentences.cn: 房子里似乎悄然无声，安静得好像已经没人在住一样。

sentences.en: The missiles can be fired only if the operator types in a six-digit code.
sentences.cn: 只有在操作员输入一组六位数密码后，导弹才能发射。

sentences.en: They get angry if they think they are being treated disrespectfully.
sentences.cn: 他们要是觉得受到了怠慢，就会大动肝火。

sentences.en: Things might have been different if I'd talked a bit more.
sentences.cn: 如果当时我再多说一点的话，结果或许会不一样。

sentences.en: We’ll face that problem if and when it comes along (= if it happens or when it happens ).
sentences.cn: 如果这一问题真的发生了，我们就要面对它。

sentences.en: We’ll stay at home if it rains.
sentences.cn: 如果下雨，我们就待在家里。

sentences.en: What would happen to your family if you were to die in an accident?
sentences.cn: 要是你在意外事故中身亡，你的家人会怎么样呢？

sentences.en: Willy would have to tell George more, if only to stop him pestering.
sentences.cn: 即使只为了阻止乔治惹恼别人，威利也会告诉他更多的。

sentences.en: witches are real if and only if there are criteria for identifying witches.
sentences.cn: 当且仅当有标准识别女巫，女巫才是真实存在的。

sentences.en: You have to do everything you can. You have to work your hardest. And if you do, if you stay positive, then you have a shot at a silver lining.
sentences.cn: 你必须全力以赴，最大限度地去努力。如果你这么做，并且保持乐观，你就会看见乌云背后的幸福线。

words.tran_cn: （表条件）如果；即使；是否；（表假设）假如

phrases.tran_cn: 如果是这样的话（之前多已提及相反的情况）
如果某事真会发生的话；如果某人真要做某事的话
假如，要是；如果真有(我当真)
［用于提出更极端的说法］甚至可能
假设和转折；遁词；借口；推托

trans.tran_cn: 如果，倘若，即使，〈口〉是否，假设
trans.tran_en: used when talking about something that might happen or be true, or might have happened
used when saying what someone’s feelings are about a possible situation
